commit message:
Release 4.2.7

* Added local network server (requested by payam)
* Added Japanese translations (thanks Naofumi)
* Updated Basque translation
* Fixed RSS issue (reported by Manuel R)
* Fixed wrong title state in tablets for the free version
* Fixed  'Unable to pause activity' issue
* Fix for Share Rate Limiting issue - first implantation.
* Fix for Share Rate Limiting issue - to disable the max_ratio_enabled you must set the max_ratio to -1

* Revamped Options
* Added Share Ratio Limiting. It fixes issue #59
* Added a solution for '-1' values in Options
Merge branch 'testing' of /home/lgallard/Android studio Projects/qBittorrent-Client with conflicts.

*  Added validation for max_ratio value. qBittorrent server sends -1 when disabled. Changed to 1 as the WebUI does.
* Added English, Spanish and Basque translations for new Options screen.
* Added French, Italian, Japanese, Portuguese, Polish, Russian, and Swdish translations for new Options screen.
* Added  translations for new Options screen (array xml).
* Updated Spanish  translation for Options screen

* Changed default icon to te question mark icon for torrent list and torrent details.
* Added cases for 'metaDL', 'forceDL', ''missingFiles', 'unknown'
* Change default behaviour for pause, start and delete actions in torrent details for Phone version
* Added delay for priority, download first and last parts, and sequential downloads
* Removed delay for download first and last parts, and sequential downloads

Release 4.2.8

* Revamped the Options menu
* Fixed disabling of Share Ratio Limiting when Options are saved in qBittorrent v.3.3x
* Change default behaviour for actions in torrent details for Phone versions
* Improved state recognition for qBittorrent v.3.3.x
* Updated Basque and Japanese translations
